alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Grenada; Montgomery; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 9:42AM CST until January 03 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Grenada County in north central Mississippi... Webster County in north central Mississippi... Central Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 1045 AM CST. * At 942 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winona, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sweatman and Lodi around 955 AM CST. Misterton around 1000 AM CST. Embry around 1005 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mantee and Walthall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for north central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central and northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
